translation: Others who regulate their diet offer life-breaths in each life-breath. All these are knowers of sacrifice, whose sins are destroyed through sacrifice.
commentary: 4.30 Other other persons? Regular foods of regulated food? Pranan lifreaths? in the life-force in the lifreaths? Juhvati sacrifice? All all? Even also? These these? Yajnavidah knowers of sacrifice? Yajnakshapitakalmasah whose sins are destroyed by sacrifice.Commentary Niyataharah means persons of regulated or limited food. They take moderate food. By rigid dieting they control the passions and appetites by weakening
